meanings.definition: A Hindu cosmological age, characterized by a specific set of conditions or qualities.
meanings.sent1: In Hinduism, a yuga is a special era with unique features.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts describe the yuga as a distinct period in time.
meanings.sent3: During the yuga, even the gods are said to behave differently.
meanings.sent4: The yuga can be seen as a chapter in the grand book of existence.
meanings.sent5: The concept of yuga helps us understand the cyclical nature of the universe.

meanings.definition: A period of time in Hindu philosophy, typically lasting thousands or millions of years.
meanings.sent1: The yuga in Hindu philosophy spans thousands of years.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the yuga to comprehend the vastness of time.
meanings.sent3: Imagine living through a yuga - what stories you would have!
meanings.sent4: The yuga stretches out like an endless road ahead.
meanings.sent5: The yuga is like a tapestry woven with threads of centuries.
